Dingus Rancher ~ The Comic About Monsters and the Weirdos Who Raise Them
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Cafe: Archived Topics From Prior Years: Year 2012 Topics: Dingus Rancher ~ The Comic About Monsters and the Weirdos Who Raise Them
By GM on Saturday, January 14, 2012 - 10:30 pm:

How's everyone been doing? This past year's been pretty busy for me, and it's about to get even busier!

For the past four years, me and a close friend of mine have been working on a pretty ambitious Monster Rancher comic project. We went into full-on production just last year, and on Jan 1st we officially launched!

Welcome to the world of Dingus Rancher!

Here's the deal; Dingus Rancher chronicles the lives of a trio of eccentric breeders over the course of their careers. While it's based pretty closely on MR1-to-4, you don't need to know anything about the games, or even video games in general, to enjoy it. We update weekly on Sundays, rotating between strips focusing on the first four games, so there will be something for any MR fan.

Parental guidance is suggested for children under 12 years and select species of sea cucumber.

Enjoy!
